text: Rubén Alfonso Ramírez Enríquez (4 March 1936 – 11 February 2021) was a Guatemalan politician and television presenter. He was the Minister of Education during the Alejandro Maldonado presidency from 2015 to 2016. He was born Chicacao, Guatemala. Alfonso Ramírez died on 11 February 2021 in Guatemala City, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Guatemalan politicians Category:North American entertainers Category:Television presenters Category:Guatemalan writers
title: Rubén Alfonso Ramírez
